property.name: Parent
property.tp:docstring: The object path of the parent device (if the VXLAN is not purely internal to this host).

property.name: Group
property.tp:docstring: The IP (v4 or v6) multicast group used to communicate with other physical hosts on this VXLAN.

property.name: Local
property.tp:docstring: The local IPv4 or IPv6 address to use when sending VXLAN packets to other physical hosts.

property.name: Tos
property.tp:docstring: The value to use in the IP ToS field for VXLAN packets sent to other physical hosts.

property.name: Ttl
property.tp:docstring: The value to use in the IP TTL field for VXLAN packets sent to other physical hosts.

property.name: Learning
property.tp:docstring: True if the VXLAN dynamically learns remote IP addresses.

property.name: Ageing
property.tp:docstring: The interval at which the kernel purges stale cached addresses (in kernel jiffies, ie, centiseconds).

property.name: Limit
property.tp:docstring: The maximum number of entries that can be added to the VXLAN's forwarding table.

property.name: DstPort
property.tp:docstring: Destination port for outgoing VXLAN packets.

property.name: SrcPortMin
property.tp:docstring: The lowest source port number to use for outgoing VXLAN packets.

property.name: SrcPortMax
property.tp:docstring: The highest source port number to use for outgoing VXLAN packets.

property.name: Proxy
property.tp:docstring: True if the VXLAN is implementing DOVE ARP proxying for remote clients.

property.name: Rsc
property.tp:docstring: True if the VXLAN is implementing DOVE route short-circuiting of known remote IP addresses.

property.name: L2miss
property.tp:docstring: True if the VXLAN will emit netlink notifications of L2 switch misses.

property.name: L3miss
property.tp:docstring: True if the VXLAN will emit netlink notifications of L3 switch misses.

arg.name: properties
arg.tp:docstring: A dictionary mapping property names to variant boxed values
